name: Lights Out (itch)
description:
Rebecca was having a nice sleepover with her friends when suddenly the power goes out and they are attacked... by a fairy?!

Play as Rebecca, a young girl trying to find her friends after the power goes out while avoiding a Dullahan in your house on "official business". However, as you explore the house with only a back-up generator working, you realize that there is only enough power to light one room at a time! This game has completely custom tilesets and character art as well as 1 ending (and a few changes to the ending if you talk to a certain fairy a lot).

This game was made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare #39, where the theme was "Running out of Power". All art assets, scripting, and writing were done by me, Mikomi Kisomi. This runs on RPG Maker MV.

Twitter ♦ Discord Server

EDIT: As of September 14th, 2017, the post-Ludum Dare build of this game is playable in-browser! There are new tilemaps, more fairies, a much larger map, a puzzle, a harder setting, more art, and a few map position changes (so if you played the LD version, you can play this one and not know where everything is). The version I made for Ludum Dare in 72 hours is avaliable for download.

Also, there's a fan translation of it into Portuguese! You can play it here.
